attributes.action: Commit the UK, to focusing on beating Covid19, by delaying brexit for 24 months.
attributes.additional_details:
The Covid19 Pandemic is the UK's biggest and most urgent threat today.
We are living through unprecedented times, the like of which the UK has never faced before.
We are a 'Great' nation, but it is unrealistic to consider that things can 'go on as normal' whilst we fight this Covid19 pandemic.
If we honestly wish to beat this challenge, we need to be single minded to do so. 
As a society we can not afford the luxury of distractions like Brexit, HS2, or others which do not help the Covid19 fight.
attributes.background:
The Covid19 Pandemic is the UK's biggest and most urgent threat today.
We are living through unprecedented times, the like of which the UK has never faced before.
It is unrealistic to consider that things can 'go on as normal' whilst we fight this Covid19 pandemic.
Brexit actions must be delayed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300412

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
